list.name: Changes
list.comment:
ðŸŒ Localization Update
Added support for four new languages:
German (de_de)
French (fr_fr)
Spanish (es_es)
Portuguese â€” Brazil (pt_br)
All current items (Loaf, Apple Pie, Carrot Soup, Sushi) now have translations in these languages.
Improved internal language file structure for easier future expansion.
ðŸ› Technical
Updated project version to 0.0.5.
Verified compatibility with Minecraftâ€™s language loading system.
Prepared the mod for adding more languages in upcoming updates.
